text: Haunting

author: TheOldskool2009

text:
To think that one day, a city may very well look like this.
Forgotten in time, all life within it forever silent... While it lay there in ruin in its new beauty
author: Davain1800s

text: @Davain1800s This comment reminded me of Casshern Sins alot; can there still be beauty in the despairing ruin? beautiful comment, beautiful anime.
author: MuztacheOutlaw

text: +MuztacheOutlaw that anime is depressing
author: ragnaroktomorrow

text: +Davain1800s nice writing man. Im hearing this song for the first time and it is really hauntingly beautiful
author: southstar44

text: +southstar44 oh thank you, this song is definitely hauntingly wondrous, while listening to it, i was thinking heavily on what explorers who find these kind of places feel and wondered they wondered who or what once stood where they had. equally so what the last of the people thought when they saw their home become forgotten.
author: Davain1800s

text:
+Davain1800s Nice comments and thoughts man. Ancient places seem like another world entirely that is far removed from our own. Almost like science fiction, expect it was all real. 


This music definitely carries that vibe man
author: southstar44

text: A land where sea and space are intertwined. An aquatic feel surrounds the ruins that was once a proud civilization. Mystic qualities engulfs the vision of those who enter. Beauty within ruins. A place for lost souls to rest.
author: SanRok

text: I always thought of Old Miltia as a planet that had died off completely during an apocalypse, but going here in Xenosaga II made me realize that they'd lived there in complete horror for 14 whole years, trapped in a hell brought to reality.

author: Derp Herp

text:
I've now uploaded the 5 VGMs I'd listen to the most while studying a couple years ago during my B.Sc. I listed them in the last X2 upload : Old Miltia and Omega System from this game, Lost Forest from Legaia 2, Electric Power Building from Breath of Fire V and Dolphin's Intrigue from Ecco.

My studying/surfing ambient playlist is quite bigger now, but it still has those 5 themes. Someday I might create this playlist on YT for you guys if you want, a lot of the themes are already in the list.
author: SupraDarky
